The 51-year-old Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. Spy"/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said. "It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body."

John McCain ( R-Ariz.) gave a curt response Thursday to reports that former defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld had some unkind things to say about him in his new book, Known and Unknown. Thank God he was relieved of his duties, John McCain said on ABC's "Good Morning America," after admitting that the two had had a contentious working relationship that often caused them to butt heads over Iraq war policy.
